cavextable.title: Cavextable
cavextable.description: Workplace booking system for manufacturing with interactive map and comprehensive employee evaluation
highlights: Interactive SVG map with zoom and zone navigation
Multi-factor ratings with role-based weight coefficients
Three-month evaluation cycles with automatic notifications
Sliding window attendance calculation for periods
Employee rating and attendance dynamics charts

manipeni.title: Manipeni CRM
manipeni.description: Comprehensive CRM system for furniture manufacturing with automatic salary calculation, warehouse management, logistics and analytics
highlights: Legacy system modernization: Prisma ORM and express-zod-api for typed API
SQL triggers for automatic salary calculation
Task system with statuses and executor reassignment
Chats: private and group conversations with attachments and archiving
Web-push notifications via Service Worker and VAPID keys

crm2.title: Service CRM
crm2.description: Service request management system with scheduling and notifications
highlights: Request tracking from creation to completion
Staff scheduling calendar
Automated SMS and email notifications
Complete customer service history

theater.title: Theater Website
theater.description: Official website of the Udmurt Republic State National Theater with schedule, repertoire and ticket service integration
highlights: Complete legacy site redesign to modern stack
QuickTickets integration for online ticket purchase
Full data and media migration from old site
Custom Strapi lifecycle hooks for slug auto-generation
BVI plugin with lazy-loading for visually impaired visitors
